verses.text:
And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.  +  r 13.1  t did evil…: Heb. added to commit, etc *

¶ And there was a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w*, of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Danites|strong="H1839"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*; and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add was\add* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* not.

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Behold now, thou \add art\add* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*, and \w bearest|strong="H3205"\w* not: but thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

Now therefore \w beware|strong="H8104"\w*, I pray thee, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* not \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* nor strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* not any \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add thing:\add*

For, lo, thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2030"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; and no \w razor|strong="H4177"\w* shall \w come|strong="H5927"\w* on his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: for the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall be a \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: and he shall \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

¶ Then the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H0559"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto me, and his \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w* \add was\add* like the \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w* of an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*: but I \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* him not whence he \add was\add*, neither \w told|strong="H5046"\w* he me his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

But he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Behold, thou shalt \w conceive|strong="H2030"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; and now \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* no \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* nor strong \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, neither \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* any \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \add thing:\add* for the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall be a \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* to the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

¶ Then \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0994"\w* my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which thou didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w* come \w again|strong="H0935"\w* unto us, and \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* us what we shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* that shall be \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*; and the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* came \w again|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* as she \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: but \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* not with her.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* made \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto me, that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto me the \add other\add* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add*.

And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Now let thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*. How shall we \w order|strong="H4941"\w* the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, and \add how\add* shall we \w do|strong="H4639"\w* unto him?\f + \fr 13.12 \ft How shall we order…: Heb. What shall be the manner of the, etc\f*\f + \fr 13.12 \ft how shall we do…: or, what shall he do?: Heb. what shall be his work?\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*, Of all that I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* let her \w beware|strong="H8104"\w*.

She may not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of any \add thing\add* that \w cometh|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, neither let her \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* or strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, nor \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* any \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \add thing:\add* all that I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* her let her \w observe|strong="H8104"\w*.

¶ And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I pray thee, let us \w detain|strong="H6113"\w* thee, until we shall have made \w ready|strong="H6213"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* thee.\f + \fr 13.15 \ft for thee: Heb. before thee\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w*, Though thou \w detain|strong="H6113"\w* me, I will not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: and \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, thou must \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* it unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. For \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that he \add was\add* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, What \add is\add* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, that when thy \w sayings|strong="H1697"\w* come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* we may do thee \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*?

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why \w askest|strong="H7592"\w* thou thus after my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, seeing it \add is\add* \w secret|strong="H6383"\w*?\f + \fr 13.18 \ft secret: or, wonderful\f*

So \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w* with a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \add it\add* upon a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and \add the angel\add* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w wondrously|strong="H6381"\w*; and \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* looked \w on|strong="H7200"\w*.

For it came to pass, when the \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* from off the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* looked \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and fell \w on|strong="H5307"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

But the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* did no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* to \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* and to his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*. Then \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that he \add was\add* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, We shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, because we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w If|strong="H3863"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* were \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* us, he would not have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* at our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, neither would he have \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* us all these \add things\add*, nor would as at this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* have \w told|strong="H8085"\w* us \add such things\add* as \w these|strong="H2063"\w*.

¶ And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*: and the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* him.

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to move him at \w times|strong="H6470"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* between \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* and \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w*.\f + \fr 13.25 \ft the camp…: Heb. Mahaneh-dan\f*
